mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RESOURCE ( F_RESOURCE_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_DEFAULT_VALUE, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ resourceId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ defaultValue }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RESOURCE SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_DEFAULT_VALUE = #{ defaultValue }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_RESOURCE_ID = #{ resourceId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_RESOURCE_ID AS "resourceId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_DEFAULT_VALUE AS "defaultValue", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_DEFAULT_VALUE AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_RESOURCE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_RESOURCE_ID = #{ resourceId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_RESOURCE T1

SELECT T1.F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", T1.F_GRADLE_NAME AS "gradleName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title" FROM T_PROJECT T1 WHERE T1.F_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }
